lead_paragraph: Back when the playoffs started nearly seven weeks ago, San Jose Sharks defenseman Paul Martin wondered what it would be like to play his old teammates in Pittsburgh in the Stanley Cup Final.

headline.print_headline: Stanley Cup Final Turns Into Reunion for Sharks' Paul Martin
headline.main: Stanley Cup Final Turns Into Reunion for Sharks' Paul Martin

snippet: Back when the playoffs started nearly seven weeks ago, San Jose Sharks defenseman Paul Martin wondered what it would be like to play his old teammates in Pittsburgh in the Stanley Cup Final....
